Family

My family has been a big part of my life and the things that I done, and decisions that I have made in my life. My wife has been a huge changing factor in my life.

She has been one of the biggest changing factors in my life. The other one has been my wonderful son. Between the two of them I have become a better person and am happy with who I am and what I have done with my life because of them.

Here is a picture of my wife and son when he was only a few months old.
It was a big change in my life, and a big motivating factor in my life to be better an to do better.

I am very thankful for my family for all the support that they have shown me through my life. They have helped me through some hard times and helped me move out of my comfort zones to do things that I didn't think I could do.
